name: Lucky's Lucky 7 Slots (Android)
description:
[Early Access / Beta]

A simple but fun slots game for Android (2.3.1+).  Features animations, sounds (can be turned off), and a bonus round!  Lucky the Raccoon hosts.

No ads, analytics, or internet access required to play!

Note:

This game was made with Unity3D.  If  you receive an error that your hardware doesn't support the application, check this compatibility list (unofficial).  Any other problems, please let me know -- thanks!
